title: The Writer's Almanac for Thursday, January 6, 2022
description: “I write pieces, and move them around. And the fun of it is watching the truthful parts slide together. What is false won’t fit.” --Elizabeth Strout, novelist, born on this day in 1956.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “I write pieces, and move them around. And the fun of it is watching the truthful parts slide together. What is false won’t fit.” --Elizabeth Strout, novelist, born on this day in 1956.
